relations.name: /business/company_shareholder/major_shareholder_of
relations.description: This relation identifies individuals or entities that hold a significant percentage of shares in a company.

relations.name: /business/company/advisors
relations.description: This relation connects a company to its advisory board members or consultants who provide strategic guidance.

relations.name: /business/company/founders
relations.description: This relation denotes the individuals who established or co-founded a company.

relations.name: /business/company/industry
relations.description: This relation categorizes a company based on the sector or field in which it operates.

relations.name: /business/company/major_shareholders
relations.description: This relation lists all significant shareholders of a company, highlighting their ownership stakes.

relations.name: /business/company/place_founded
relations.description: This relation specifies the geographical location where a company was established.

relations.name: /business/person/company
relations.description: This relation links individuals to the companies they are associated with, whether as employees, owners, or executives.

relations.name: /location/administrative_division/country
relations.description: This relation connects administrative divisions, such as states or provinces, to their respective countries.

relations.name: /location/country/administrative_divisions
relations.description: This relation outlines the various administrative divisions within a specific country.

relations.name: /location/country/capital
relations.description: This relation identifies the capital city of a given country.

relations.name: /location/location/contains
relations.description: This relation indicates that one geographical location encompasses another, such as a city within a state.

relations.name: /location/neighborhood/neighborhood_of
relations.description: This relation describes the association between neighborhoods and the larger areas they belong to.

relations.name: /people/deceased_person/place_of_death
relations.description: This relation specifies the location where an individual passed away.

relations.name: /people/ethnicity/geographic_distribution
relations.description: This relation illustrates how an ethnicity is spread across different geographical regions.

relations.name: /people/ethnicity/people
relations.description: This relation connects specific individuals to their respective ethnic backgrounds.

relations.name: /people/person/children
relations.description: This relation links individuals to their offspring or children.

relations.name: /people/person/ethnicity
relations.description: This relation identifies the ethnic background of an individual.

relations.name: /people/person/nationality
relations.description: This relation denotes the nationality or citizenship of an individual.

relations.name: /people/person/place_lived
relations.description: This relation specifies locations where an individual has resided throughout their life.

relations.name: /people/person/place_of_birth
relations.description: This relation indicates the location where an individual was born.

relations.name: /people/person/profession
relations.description: This relation connects individuals to their respective professions or occupations.

relations.name: /people/person/religion
relations.description: This relation identifies the religious beliefs or affiliations of an individual.

relations.name: /sports/sports_team_location/teams
relations.description: This relation associates sports teams with their respective locations or cities.

relations.name: /sports/sports_team/location
relations.description: This relation specifies the geographical location where a sports team is based.
